reasoning: Reporting incidence of diagnosed CMV infections at ~50 per 100k person-years. Includes symptomatic primary infections, congenital CMV, and reactivation disease. Wide variation in surveillance definitions limits confidence.
source: Cannon MJ et al. (2010). Review of cytomegalovirus seroprevalence and demographic characteristics associated with infection. Rev Med Virol. 20(4):202-213
